description: VSCode static command line definition file

locale.description: The display Language to use. Picking a different language requires the associated language pack to be installed.

disable-hardware-acceleration.description: Disables hardware acceleration. ONLY change this option if you encounter graphic issues.

disable-color-correct-rendering.description: Resolves issues around color profile selection. ONLY change this option if you encounter graphic issues.

force-color-profile.markdownDescription: Allows to override the color profile to use. If you experience colors appear badly, try to set this to `srgb` and restart.

enable-proposed-api.description: Enable proposed APIs for a list of extension ids (such as `vscode.git`). Proposed APIs are unstable and subject to breaking without warning at any time. This should only be set for extension development and testing purposes.

force-renderer-accessibility.description: Forces the renderer to be accessible. ONLY change this if you are using a screen reader on Linux. On other platforms the renderer will automatically be accessible. This flag is automatically set if you have editor.accessibilitySupport: on.
